name: marbly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
decorated with or having lines and areas of colour, especially used of the white patterns of fat in red meat : The small farm shop sold organic lamb and marbly beef from many rare breeds. We will be changing the flooring to a tile that has a white and light grey marbly effect.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen making this dish, use pieces from the marbly end of a pork loin.The walls were papered with a marbly, pale yellow wallpaper.The amount of coconut milk depends on what kind of meat is used, as marbly meats absorb less liquid than lean meat.
